scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd backend && npm start
scripts.simulate:production: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/ && cd backend && npm start
